title: LOCATION OF ISOLATION DEVICES
fullText:
The isolation devices shall be readily accessible. Where the cables connecting pre-assembled battery systems and PCEs are less than 2 m in length, the isolation device(s) shall be installed adjacent to either the pre-assembled battery system or the PCE.
Where the cables connecting the pre-assembled battery system to the PCE are greater than 2 m in length, an isolating device shall be installed at both the pre-assembled battery system and PCE.
NOTE In battery system rooms, the treatment of the access to isolation devices for emergency services personnel may mean that the devices are located near the entrance door.
